mapper.select: select pi.* from point p join point_info pi on p.code=pi.code and p.status=1 join equipment e on e.code=p.object_code and e.status=1 join equipment_info ei on e.code=ei.code where e.trans_code=#{transCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and substring_index(ei.name,'_',1) = #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and pi.name like CONCAT('',#{pointName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') limit 1
select GROUP_CONCAT(pi.code) from point_info pi where pi.name = #{pointName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT * from point where status = 1 and type ='mn' and trans_code in(select code from transformer where unattend in(0,1)) order by id
